remarks: Subspace join for ` DVecA ` partial vector space.  TODO: take out hypothesis .i, no longer used.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
djaval.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djaval.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
djaval.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
djaval.n $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocA ` K ) ` W ) $.
djaval.j $e |- J = ( ( vA ` K ) ` W ) $.
djafvalN $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> J = ( x e. ~P T , y e. ~P T |-> ( ._|_ ` ( ( ._|_ ` x ) i^i ( ._|_ ` y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d K x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d W x y $.
